name: Jackson Carta
description: California kid who loves to dance. Favorite movie: He Got Game
review: Endgame consists almost entirely of the downtime scenes that were always secretly everyone's favorite parts of these movies anyway.

name: Pastulio Spencer
description: Born in Portland, Oregon. Loves music, photography and movies! Favorite movie: The Silence of the Lambs
review: Marwan Kenzari snarls it up as the villainous Jafar, while Nasim Pedrad is endearing and funny as Jasmine's handmaiden and best friend Dalia...

name: Oscar Chung
description: Grew up in Pennsylvania. Loves being social and making new friends. Favorite Movie: Pineapple Express
review: This dizzy, delirious jukebox musical has the energy and visual dynamism to truly reflect the outlandish aesthetic and performance style of its subject.

name: Andreas Saltino
description: Born in Portland, Maine. Enjoys a good scare. Favorite Movie: Get Out
review_title: Mr. Wick Quickly Becoming a Legend
review: [I]t's a fun, entertaining romp that knows it's ridiculous from the moment that Wick takes out a towering 7-footer (the Philadelphia 76ers' Boban MarjanoviÄ‡) by beating him to death in a library with a book.

name: Chasen Cohen
description: Born in Israel. Enjoys praticing his faith and watching movies. Favorite Movie: Dumb and Dumber To
review: The thrills come extra cheap and late in Tate Taylor's Ma, a horror movie torn between campiness and compassion.
